page.title: 05PORKELLIS Cornwall-Leisure
page.content: As in many rural areas entertainment has to be largely home made.Television has killed off a number of local activities, but the Wendron Silver Band, based in PORKELLIS, is thriving and there is an active Cricket Club in the area. There is an annual Horticultural show in PORKELLIS. For further entertainment people from the area have to travel into Camborne Redruth, or Helston. There is only one Public House in the whole area. Carnkie has a branch of the Women's Institute, and there is a Play Group for children of pre-school age.
